verses.verse: And in that day<WH3117> you shall say,<WH559> O LORD,<WH3068> I will praise<WH3034> you: though<WH3588> you were angry<WH599> with me, your anger<WH639> is turned<WH7725> away, and you comforted<WH5162> me.

Behold,<WH2009> God<WH410> is my salvation;<WH3444> I will trust,<WH982> and not be afraid:<WH6342> for the LORD<WH3050> JEHOVAH<WH3068> is my strength<WH5797> and my song;<WH2176> he also is become<WH1961> my salvation.<WH3444>
Therefore with joy<WH8342> shall you draw<WH7579> water<WH4325> out of the wells<WH4599> of salvation.<WH3444>

And in that day<WH3117> shall you say,<WH559> Praise<WH3034> the LORD,<WH3068> call<WH7121> on his name,<WH8034> declare<WH3045> his doings<WH5949> among the people,<WH5971> make mention<WH2142> that his name<WH8034> is exalted.<WH7682>
Sing<WH2167> to the LORD;<WH3068> for he has done<WH6213> excellent<WH1348> things: this<WH2063> is known<WH3045> in all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
Cry<WH6670> out and shout,<WH7442> you inhabitant<WH3427> of Zion:<WH6726> for great<WH1419> is the Holy<WH6918> One of Israel<WH3478> in the middle<WH7130> of you.
